LanguageData.WorkToBuild.label: work to build
LanguageData.WorkToBuild.description: The base amount of work it takes to build a structure, once all materials are gathered.
LanguageData.DoorOpenSpeed.label: door opening speed
LanguageData.DoorOpenSpeed.description: The speed at which the door opens. Slow doors will slow down everyone who uses them.
LanguageData.BedRestEffectiveness.label: rest effectiveness
LanguageData.BedRestEffectiveness.description: How fast people sleeping on this gain rest.
LanguageData.TrapMeleeDamage.label: trap melee damage
LanguageData.TrapMeleeDamage.description: How much damage this trap does on average. The actual damage in any instance will vary randomly.
LanguageData.TrapSpringChance.label: trap spring chance
LanguageData.TrapSpringChance.description: The likelihood that the trap will spring when an unaware creature passes over it.
LanguageData.ResearchSpeedFactor.label: research speed factor
LanguageData.ResearchSpeedFactor.description: The speed at which people do research is multiplied by this value.
LanguageData.MedicalTendQualityOffset.label: medical tend quality offset
LanguageData.MedicalTendQualityOffset.description: Medical tend quality is offset by this value.
LanguageData.ImmunityGainSpeedFactor.label: immunity gain speed factor
LanguageData.ImmunityGainSpeedFactor.description: Immunity gain speed is multiplied by this value.
LanguageData.WorkTableWorkSpeedFactor.label: work speed factor
LanguageData.WorkTableWorkSpeedFactor.description: Work speed is multiplied by this value.
LanguageData.WorkTableEfficiencyFactor.label: work efficiency factor
LanguageData.WorkTableEfficiencyFactor.description: Work efficiency is multiplied by this value.
LanguageData.JoyGainFactor.label: recreation power
LanguageData.JoyGainFactor.description: How effectively this item entertains people and fulfills the need for recreation.
LanguageData.SurgerySuccessChanceFactor.label: surgery success chance factor
LanguageData.SurgerySuccessChanceFactor.description: A multiplier to the chance that a surgery will succeed when performed here. Surgery success chances are also affected by many other factors, including the surgeon's ability and medicine used.
